channel.title: Ruby on Ramblings of a build engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Ruby on Ramblings of a build engineer

item.title: Testing ‘code’ tag.
item.description: Hello. This is just a quick post to test the working of the code tag. 1 2 3 Given(/The Action is ([A-z]*)/) do |action| @action = action end Perfect!! The name of the plugin is WP-Syntax. The trick is to edit the page in plain HTML. Because the WordPress word editor screws up the <> tags. But surely you already knew that…
